name: Watch out those METEORITES!
description:
Play

Though the title of this game tells you to watch out meteorites, but what you need to do now is RUN INTO THEM! To PROTECT the Earth your sacrifice is necessary!

Your goal is to keep the Earth safe. When you observe any meteorite, hit it with your spaceship without hesitation. You can stand on the two repair stations to refresh your spaceship, to bump into more meteorites! You can also dash if you have blue energy.

Controls:

Use ARROW keys or WASD to control the spaceship, and use SPACE bar to dash when you have energy. During your game, you can press ESC to pause and resume.

Cautions: 

This game will not remember your high score after you close the app.

Future:

I plan to make this game more complete and fun. So check out for more updates from time to time :)

Have fun!
